trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> to the event handlers that implement the command.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>實作命令的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding associates a command with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events which implement and determine the status of the command.
trans-unit.target: CommandBinding 關聯的命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件實作，並判斷命令的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> events are raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>呼叫時， <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>/<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>命令目標會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a CommandBinding for the command, the appropriate handlers are called.
trans-unit.target: 如果在命令目標有 CommandBinding 命令，會呼叫適當的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a CommandBinding for the command, the events are routed through the element tree until an element that has a CommandBinding is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標並沒有命令 CommandBinding，事件會路由處理項目樹狀中，直到找到具有 CommandBinding 的項目。

trans-unit.source: A CommandBinding has limited use with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> that is not a<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: CommandBinding 具有有限的使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>也就是不<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand></xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>與

trans-unit.source: This is because a CommandBinding binds the command to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> which listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> routed events which are raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> are called.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 CommandBinding 繫結到命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>其中聆聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>路由事件的引發的時機<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>類別

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: 基底的新命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>使用指定的類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: 基底的新命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>上。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>針對新事件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>使用指定的類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on.
trans-unit.target: 基底的新命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>上。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed"></xref>針對新事件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref> event on the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute"></xref>針對新事件<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 發生於與此相關聯的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>開始檢查是否可以在命令目標上執行命令。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>呼叫時，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute>命令目標上引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the CanExecute event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的事件，會引發 CanExecute 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>CanExecute 處理常式，該命令的<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the CanExecute event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>CanExecute 事件 （泡泡） 命令中，向上搜尋項目，具有項目樹狀<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding tunneling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |反昇 | |委派 || -對應通道的事件為。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 搭配此繫結相關聯的命令。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於與此相關聯的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>執行。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>執行時，便會產生<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>命令目標上的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted> event is not handled, the Executed event is raised on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>未處理的事件、 執行引發的命令目標。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the specific command, the Executed handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>之特定命令的執行處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that specific command the Executed event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>該特定命令執行事件反昇項目樹狀目錄中搜尋項目，具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is not found, the command is not handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>找不到，未處理命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding tunneling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |反昇 | |委派 || -對應通道的事件為。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> initiates a check to determine whether the command can be executed on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: 發生於與此相關聯的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>開始檢查是否可以在目前命令目標上執行命令。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is called, the PreviewCanExecute event is raised on the command target if the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>呼叫時，在命令目標會引發事件，如果命令目標有 PreviewCanExecute<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 然後在<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event bubbles up the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>事件 （泡泡） 最多的項目樹狀目錄中搜尋項目，具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Tunneling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding bubbling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |通道 | |委派 || -對應反昇事件為。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the command associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於與此相關聯的命令<xref href="System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding"></xref>執行。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> executes, it raises the PreviewExecuted event on the command target.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>執行時，便會產生 PreviewExecuted 事件，在命令目標。</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the command target has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted handler for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令目標有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>PreviewExecuted 命令的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the command target does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for the command the PreviewExecuted event tunnels down the element tree searching for an element that has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在命令目標<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>命令 PreviewExecuted 事件通道向下搜尋項目，具有項目樹狀<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>與命令相關聯。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the preview event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> event is raised on command target.
trans-unit.target: 如果未處理的預覽事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>引發的命令目標。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Tunneling| |Delegate|| - The corresponding bubbling event is .
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |通道 | |委派 || -對應反昇事件為。
